00050 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 PagingLandScapeIntersectionSceneQuery::PagingLandScapeIntersectionSceneQuery(SceneManager* creator)
00052         : PagingLandScapeOctreeIntersectionSceneQuery(creator)
00053 {
00054     // Add bounds fragment type
00055     mSupportedWorldFragments.insert(SceneQuery::WFT_SINGLE_INTERSECTION);
00056     mSupportedWorldFragments.insert(SceneQuery::WFT_PLANE_BOUNDED_REGION);
00057 }
00058 
00059 //---------------------------------------------------------------------

00061 {
00062 }
00063 
00064 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 void PagingLandScapeIntersectionSceneQuery::execute(IntersectionSceneQueryListener* listener)
00066 {
00067         if(mWorldFragmentType == SceneQuery::WFT_SINGLE_INTERSECTION)
00068     {
00069                 PagingLandScapeOctreeIntersectionSceneQuery::execute(listener);
00070     }
00071     else if (mWorldFragmentType ==  SceneQuery::WFT_PLANE_BOUNDED_REGION)
00072     {
00073         // We want the whole bounded volume
00074 //        assert((*bi)->fragment.fragmentType == SceneQuery::WFT_PLANE_BOUNDED_REGION);
00075 //        if (!listener->queryResult(const_cast<WorldFragment*>(&(brush->fragment)), 
00076 //            result.second + traceDistance))
00077 //                      return false; 
00078 
00079     }
00080 }
00081
